```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(esquisse)
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
library(DT)

trial.dataset <- read_csv("combined datasets.csv")
trial.dataset

trial.dataset.clean <- trial.dataset %>%
 filter(Group %in% "UKBB")
```

## Column {data-width="650"}

### Chart A

```{r}
graph <- ggplot(trial.dataset.clean) +
  aes(
    x = hypertension,
    y = age_at_last_follow_up,
    fill = atrial_fibrillation
  ) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(graph)
```
